Package niagara.optimizer.rules

Interface Summary
Initializable Operators initializable by logical operators
 

Class Summary
Antecedent Antecedent patterns for ConstructedRules.
AssociateJoinLtoR Join associativity, left to right : (A x B) x C -> A x (B x C)
AssociateJoinRtoL Join associativity, right to left: A x (B x C) -> (A x B) x C
CommuteJoin Commute a remote subplan on the left ith a local subplan on the right
CommuteRL Commute a remote subplan on the left ith a local subplan on the right
Consequent Consequent patterns for ConstructedRules.
ConsolidateMeRule ConsolidateMeRule maps a non-consolidated operator to the ConsolidateMe pseudo-physical operator, forcing Colombia to consolidate its inputs
ConsolidatingAssociateJoinRtoL  
ConstructedRule Constructed rules are rules constructed at run time from an XML specification (but can have more complex before and after patterns than SimpleRule allows).
CustomRule Custom rules can be customized in a limited way from the catalog.
Exchange The Exchange rule: (A x B) x (C x D) -> (A x C) x (B x D)
ParsedRule A simple rule which maps (exactly) one logical operator to one initializable operator.
Pattern  
PushJoinPredicates Push as many of the non-equijoin predicates of a join operator to its inputs
PushProjection Push Project through a logical operator
SelectIntoJoin  
SelectThruUnnest Push parts of a predicate thru unnest
SimpleRule A simple rule which maps (exactly) one logical operator to one initializable operator.
UnfoldXMLScan Turn XMLScan into a FileScan and a series of Unnests
UnionToPhysicalUnion Union To PhysicalUnion implementation rule
